workflow.title: How it works?
workflow.subtitle: Quite simply ‚Äì subscription makes life easier.

steps1.title: Select the quantity
steps1.description: Choose how many Plant Pod 3-packs or 9-packs you want to receive in a single shipment and your default shipping interval

steps1.title: Choose your plants
steps1.description: Choose which Plant Pod 3-packs or 9-packs you want to receive in your subscription shipment

steps1.title: Customize as you go
steps1.description: Change your plant selection or cancel any time you want.

steps2.title: Free Shipping
steps2.description: Start gardening wherever you are. No hidden fees.

steps2.title: Sprouting guarantee
steps2.description: Sometimes nature has a mind of its own. If your plant doesn't sprout, we'll replace it.

steps2.title: Free Shipping
steps2.description: Start gardening wherever you are. No hidden fees.

catalogue.title: What can I grow?
catalogue.subtitle: Choose from over 75 varieties of herbs, flowers, leafy greens and more.

steps.title: 1. Insert the plant pods
steps.description: Our plant pods are biodegradable and contain no harmful chemicals.

steps.title: 2. Add water
steps.description: The Smart Garden 9 has a 4 l/135 oz water tank, which holds enough water for up to one month.

steps.title: 3. Plug it in and enjoy
steps.description: Thanks to its energy efficient LED lighting system, the Smart Garden 9 only consumes 13W of power.

subscribe.text: Save big and never run out of plants to grow again!

careerHero.title: Ready to help our planet and improve millions of lives?
careerHero.description: We are the leading innovators of indoor gardening and food sustainability and we would like you to join our bright minds to bring the magic of nature to our everyday lives.

items.title: Stay curious
items.description: We are innovators at heart. Fuelled by shared excitement and passion, we aim high and are constantly building the next ‚Äúbig thing(s)‚Äù.

items.title: Keep it simple, keep it clear
items.description: Clarity affords focus and with focus comes conviction and true originality. Whether for our customers, partners or colleagues, we deliver solutions that are clear, easy to use and intuitive.

items.title: We take care of each other
items.description: We‚Äôre a tight-knit bunch and we take care of each other, putting kindness and empathy above our own egos. Before acting, we always ask ourselves, am I doing either "more good" or "less harm".

items.title: Joy creates joy
items.description: With Nature, things don‚Äôt always work out quite the way you planned. This path of exploration and discovery brings us joy that we want to share with the whole world. We like to shake up the routine and bring fun to serious topics.

ecoGrid.title: The perks of being a Click & Grower

items.title: Make a green dent in the universe
items.description: Every day, you‚Äôll help people across the globe help the planet and live a healthier, mindful, and happy life.

items.title: Rewarding challenges
items.description: Making the future happen is a fast and rewarding ride. We‚Äôre a big family in small and agile teams. You‚Äôll play an integral part in everything we achieve and always have the chance to grow in Click & Grow.

items.title: The green package of joy
items.description: You‚Äôll get the perks of our start-up grade offices that are as green and full of life as they get. You can enjoy sporting benefits, health boosting food, tree planting and other team events. And you‚Äôll definitely have the chance to become a gardener and the greenest person your friends & family know.

steps.description: The Smart Garden has a 1.5 l/50.7 oz water tank, which holds enough water for up to 3 weeks.

description.title: Description
description.p1: The Smart Garden 9 is an innovative self-growing garden for every home and every plant growing need.
description.p2: Experience the benefits of having your own garden, no matter where you live. Grow 100% organic herbs, fruits, salads and flowers, free from GMOs and pesticides, fresher than any plants you'll find in stores.
list: Perfect amount of light thanks to pro-grow lights
Perfect amount of nutrients and oxygen at root level
Companion app to become a plant expert
Choose from 75+ pre-seeded plant pods from our selection or use your own seeds
A Complimentary set of plant capsules: 3x tomato, 3x basil, 3x lettuce
description.note: NB! The starter kit might contain a yellow tomato instead of a red mini tomato.

box.title: What's in the box
items: Quick Start Guide with pro gardener tips
9 complimentary plant pods: 3 x mini tomato, 3 x green lettuce, 3 x basil
